Package application

Class CollegeChecking

java.lang.Object
application.Account
application.Checking
application.CollegeChecking
public class CollegeChecking extends Checking
This is CollegeChecking class represents a college checking account. It holds the logic for getting and setting variables in the CollegeChecking class.
Author:
Kiernan King and Ahmed Alghazwi

    • monthlyInterest

      public double monthlyInterest()
      monthlyInterest returns the monthly interest of the College Checking account.
      Overrides:
      monthlyInterest in class Checking
      Returns:
      collegeCheckingMonthlyInterest if called.

    • fee

      public double fee()
      fee returns the monthly fee of the College Checking account.
      Overrides:
      fee in class Checking
      Returns:
      collegeCheckingMonthlyFee if account balance is less than $1000, collegeCheckingMonthlyFeeWaived if greater than or equal to $1000.
